title: A Light for My Love
description: Tides of passion--on the shores of love...Beautiful China Sullivan told herself she hated Jake Chastaine. They had grown up in the same Oregon seaport--but China's sheltered childhood and Jake's wild womanizing youth were worlds apart. Even worse, this handsome ship's captain had made his wealth on the high seas that had taken the lives of all those close to China, leaving her stripped of fortune and struggling for survival.Jake Chastaine turned women's heads all over the world, but the one woman he burned to possess was still far beyond his reach. Now determined to make China Sulivan forget the lonely hellion he'd once been, Jake must make her see the man he's become. But even as love begins to heal the wounds of the past, Jake must battle a new obstacle--a danger that threatens to destroy all they hold dear...
author: Alexis Harrington
